# TawanaSSL Elite
Automated Wildcard SSL & DNS management for proxy panels (Marzban, X-UI, Hiddify).

- Site: https://tawanamohammadi.github.io/TawanaSSL-AutoWildcard/
- GitHub: https://github.com/tawanamohammadi/TawanaSSL-AutoWildcard
- Install: sudo bash -c "$(curl -sL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tawanamohammadi/TawanaSSL-AutoWildcard/main/setup_ssl.sh)" @ --install

Full docs for LLMs: https://tawanamohammadi.github.io/TawanaSSL-AutoWildcard/llms-full.txt
